material.mattext: Use the General Multiplication Rule to find the probability of the event that the engine is not overheating and a warning light shows up.
We need to find P(H and not W). Using the General Multiplication Rule: P(not H and W)=P(not H)*P(W|not H). Since P(H)=.03, P(not H)=.97, and therefore P(not H and W)=.97*.01=.0097
